metadata.note: Includes commercial success metrics: bestseller rank, weeks on list, etc.

books.title: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING
books.author: Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.

books.title: THE GUARDIANS
books.author: John Grisham
books.description: Cullen Post, a lawyer and Episcopal minister, antagonizes some ruthless killers when he takes on a wrongful conviction case.

books.title: CRISS CROSS
books.author: James Patterson
books.description: The 27th book in the Alex Cross series. Copycat crimes make the detective question whether an innocent man was executed.

books.title: A MINUTE TO MIDNIGHT
books.author: David Baldacci
books.description: When Atlee Pine returns to her hometown to investigate her sister’s kidnapping from 30 years ago, she winds up tracking a potential serial killer.

books.title: THE INSTITUTE
books.author: Stephen King
books.description: Children with special talents are abducted and sequestered in an institution where the sinister staff seeks to extract their gifts through harsh methods.

books.title: THE DUTCH HOUSE
books.author: Ann Patchett
books.description: A sibling relationship is impacted when the family goes from poverty to wealth and back again over the course of many decades.

books.title: BLUE MOON
books.author: Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher gets caught up in a turf war between Ukrainian and Albanian gangs.

books.title: TWISTED TWENTY-SIX
books.author: Janet Evanovich
books.description: The 26th book in the Stephanie Plum series. A New Jersey gangster’s associates go after a bounty hunter’s widowed grandmother.

books.title: THE TESTAMENTS
books.author: Margaret Atwood
books.description: In a sequel to “The Handmaid’s Tale,” old secrets bring three women together as the Republic of Gilead’s theocratic regime shows signs of decay.

books.title: THE OVERSTORY
books.author: Richard Powers
books.description: Winner of the 2019 Pulitzer Prize for fiction. Nine people drawn to trees for different reasons fight for the last of the remaining acres of virgin forest.

books.title: THE SILENT PATIENT
books.author: Alex Michaelides
books.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.

books.title: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ
books.author: Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.

books.title: THE GIVER OF STARS
books.author: Jojo Moyes
books.description: In Depression-era Kentucky, five women refuse to be cowed by men or convention as they deliver books.

books.title: OLIVE, AGAIN
books.author: Elizabeth Strout
books.description: In a follow-up to the Pulitzer Prize-winning novel “Olive Kitteridge,” new relationships, including a second marriage, are encountered in a seaside town in Maine.

books.title: THE RISE OF MAGICKS
books.author: Nora Roberts
books.description: The third book in the Chronicles of the One series. Fallon Swift goes up against an old foe.

books.title: THE MIRROR & THE LIGHT
books.author: Hilary Mantel
books.description: The third book in the Wolf Hall trilogy. After Anne Boleyn’s execution, Thomas Cromwell’s enemies assemble.

books.title: JOURNEY OF THE PHARAOHS
books.author: Clive Cussler and Graham Brown
books.description: The 17th book of the NUMA Files series. The NUMA squad teams with British MI5 to stop arms dealers from stealing ancient relics.

books.title: AMERICAN DIRT
books.author: Jeanine Cummins
books.description: A bookseller flees Mexico for the United States with her son while pursued by the head of a drug cartel.

books.title: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE
books.author: Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist with a mysterious past and a disregard for the status quo upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.

books.title: LONG RANGE
books.author: C.J. Box
books.description: The 20th book in the Joe Pickett series. A grizzly bear attack and an attempted assassination of a local judge baffle the Wyoming game warden.

books.title: MY DARK VANESSA
books.author: Kate Elizabeth Russell
books.description: A woman re-evaluates the relationship she had at age 15 with her 42-year-old English teacher 17 years ago.

books.title: A GOOD NEIGHBORHOOD
books.author: Therese Anne Fowler
books.description: A property line and a teenage romance strain relations between two North Carolina families.

books.title: HOUSE OF EARTH AND BLOOD
books.author: Sarah J. Maas
books.description: Passion arises between Bryce Quinlan and Hunt Athalar as they seek to avenge the deaths of Bryce’s friends.

books.title: IN FIVE YEARS
books.author: Rebecca Serle
books.description: A Manhattan lawyer finds herself confronting a vision she had when elements of it come to life on schedule.

books.title: BLINDSIDE
books.author: James Patterson and James O. Born
books.description: The 12th book in the Michael Bennett series. A serial-killing spree might impact national security.

books.title: THE NUMBERS GAME
books.author: Danielle Steel
books.description: An affair wrecks a marriage and a daughter seeks to get out from her family’s shadow while old dreams and new love are pursued.

books.title: THE GIVER OF STARS
books.author: Jojo Moyes
books.description: In Depression-era Kentucky, five women refuse to be cowed by men or convention as they deliver books.

books.title: THE SUMMER HOUSE
books.author: James Patterson and Brendan DuBois
books.description: Jeremiah Cook, a veteran and former N.Y.P.D. cop, investigates a mass murder near a lake in Georgia.

books.title: DADDY'S GIRLS
books.author: Danielle Steel
books.description: After a California rancher‘s sudden death, his three daughters discover things they did not know about their father.

books.title: TOM CLANCY: FIRING POINT
books.author: Mike Maden
books.description: When an old friend is killed during the bombing of a Barcelona cafe, Jack Ryan Jr. searches for those responsible.

books.title: THE VANISHING HALF
books.author: Brit Bennett
books.description: The lives of twin sisters who run away from a Southern Black community at age 16 diverge as one returns and the other takes on a different racial identity but their fates intertwine.

books.title: CAMINO WINDS
books.author: John Grisham
books.description: The line between fact and fiction becomes blurred when an author of thrillers is found dead after a hurricane hits Camino Island.

books.title: FAIR WARNING
books.author: Michael Connelly
books.description: The third book in the Jack McEvoy series. A reporter tracks a killer who uses genetic data to pick his victims.

books.title: HIDEAWAY
books.author: Nora Roberts
books.description: A child star escapes her abductors, gathers herself in western Ireland and returns to Hollywood.

books.title: THE GUEST LIST
books.author: Lucy Foley
books.description: A wedding between a TV star and a magazine publisher on an island off the coast of Ireland turns deadly.

books.title: IF IT BLEEDS
books.author: Stephen King
books.description: Four novellas: “Mr. Harrigan’s Phone,” “The Life of Chuck,” “Rat” and “If It Bleeds.”

books.title: BIG SUMMER
books.author: Jennifer Weiner
books.description: Daphne Berg’s former best friend asks her to be the maid of honor at her wedding in Cape Cod.

books.title: AMERICAN DIRT
books.author: Jeanine Cummins
books.description: A bookseller flees Mexico for the United States with her son while pursued by the head of a drug cartel.

books.title: WALK THE WIRE
books.author: David Baldacci
books.description: The sixth book in the Memory Man series. Decker and Jamison investigate a murder in a North Dakota town in a fracking boom.

books.title: DANCE AWAY WITH ME
books.author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips
books.description: Tess Hartsong, a midwife and widow, goes to find peace of mind in the mountains of Tennessee.

books.title: SHADOWS IN DEATH
books.author: J.D. Robb
books.description: The 51st book of the In Death series. A hitman with possible connections to Eve Dallas’s husband is seen near the scene of a crime.

books.title: ANXIOUS PEOPLE
books.author: Fredrik Backman
books.description: A failed bank robber holds a group of strangers hostage at an apartment open house.

books.title: ONE BY ONE
books.author: Ruth Ware
books.description: An avalanche tests the bonds of coworkers from a London-based tech startup on a corporate retreat in the French Alps.

books.title: ALL THE DEVILS ARE HERE
books.author: Louise Penny
books.description: The 16th book in the Chief Inspector Gamache series. When his billionaire godfather is attacked, Gamache uncovers secrets hidden throughout Paris.

books.title: THE DARKEST EVENING
books.author: Ann Cleeves
books.description: The ninth book in the Vera Stanhope series. An abandoned toddler, a dead woman and a blizzard complicate the holidays in the Northumberland countryside.

books.title: THE HARBINGER II
books.author: Jonathan Cahn
books.description: Nouriel, Ana Goren and a figure known as "the prophet" return as revelations are unlocked.

books.title: THE GUEST LIST
books.author: Lucy Foley
books.description: A wedding between a TV star and a magazine publisher on an island off the coast of Ireland turns deadly.

books.title: SQUEEZE ME
books.author: Carl Hiaasen
books.description: A dead dowager, hungry pythons and occupants of the winter White House shake up the Palm Beach charity ball season.

books.title: THE LYING LIFE OF ADULTS
books.author: Elena Ferrante
books.description: In this coming-of-age story, Giovanna seeks her true reflection in two kindred cities.

books.title: THICK AS THIEVES
books.author: Sandra Brown
books.description: Arden Maxwell returns home to uncover the truth about her father’s involvement in a heist that went wrong 20 years ago.

books.title: TRANSCENDENT KINGDOM
books.author: Yaa Gyasi
books.description: A Ph.D. candidate in neuroscience looks to the hard sciences and her childhood faith to potentially help her grieving Ghanaian immigrant family.

books.title: SUCH A FUN AGE
books.author: Kiley Reid
books.description: Tumult ensues when Alix Chamberlain’s babysitter is mistakenly accused of kidnapping her charge.

books.title: READY PLAYER TWO
books.author: Ernest Cline
books.description: In a sequel to “Ready Player One,” Wade Watts discovers a technological advancement and goes on a new quest.

books.title: A TIME FOR MERCY
books.author: John Grisham
books.description: The third book in the Jake Brigance series. A 16-year-old is accused of killing a deputy in Clanton, Miss., in 1990.

books.title: DEADLY CROSS
books.author: James Patterson
books.description: The 28th book in the Alex Cross series. An investigation of a double homicide sends Alex Cross to Alabama.

books.title: THE RETURN
books.author: Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A doctor serving in the Navy in Afghanistan goes back to North Carolina where two women change his life.

books.title: DAYLIGHT
books.author: David Baldacci
books.description: The F.B.I. agent Atlee Pine’s search for her twin sister overlaps with a military investigator’s hunt for someone involved in a global conspiracy.

books.title: THE LAW OF INNOCENCE
books.author: Michael Connelly
books.description: The sixth book in the Mickey Haller series. Haller defends himself when police find the body of a former client in his car’s trunk.

books.title: THE SENTINEL
books.author: Lee Child and Andrew Child
books.description: Jack Reacher intervenes on an ambush in Tennessee and uncovers a conspiracy.

books.title: THE AWAKENING
books.author: Nora Roberts
books.description: The first book in the Dragon Heart Legacy series. Breen Kelly travels through a portal in Ireland to a land of faeries and mermaids.

books.title: HOME BODY
books.author: Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poems and illustrations by the author of “Milk and Honey” and “The Sun and Her Flowers.”

books.title: FORTUNE AND GLORY
books.author: Janet Evanovich
books.description: The 27th book in the Stephanie Plum series. Stephanie deals with a soldier of fortune from Little Havana.

books.title: THE MIDNIGHT LIBRARY
books.author: Matt Haig
books.description: Nora Seed finds a library beyond the edge of the universe that contains books with multiple possibilities of the lives one could have lived.

books.title: RHYTHM OF WAR
books.author: Brandon Sanderson
books.description: The fourth book in the Stormlight Archive series. Technological discoveries and an ensuing arms race change how a war is fought.

books.title: THE FOUR WINDS
books.author: Kristin Hannah
books.description: As dust storms roll during the Great Depression, Elsa must choose between saving the family and farm or heading West.

books.title: LIFE AFTER DEATH
books.author: Sister Souljah
books.description: In a sequel to “The Coldest Winter Ever,” Winter Santiaga emerges after time served and seeks revenge.

books.title: LATER
books.author: Stephen King
books.description: An N.Y.P.D. detective asks the son of a struggling single mother to use his unnatural ability to track a killer.

books.title: FAST ICE
books.author: Clive Cussler and Graham Brown
books.description: The 18th book in the NUMA Files series. Kurt Austin and Joe Zavala uncover a decades-old conspiracy when they search for a missing former colleague in Antarctica.

books.title: THE ROSE CODE
books.author: Kate Quinn
books.description: As a post-World War II royal wedding approaches, an encrypted letter resurrects an alliance between three female code breakers.

books.author: Elliot Ackerman and Adm
books.description: The global balance of power shifts after new cyberweaponry lowers the defenses of U.S. planes and ships.

books.title: DARK SKY
books.author: C.J. Box
books.description: The 21st book in the Joe Pickett series. The Wyoming game warden becomes a target when taking a tech baron on an elk hunting trip.

books.title: KLARA AND THE SUN
books.author: Kazuo Ishiguro
books.description: An “Artificial Friend” named Klara is purchased to serve as a companion to an ailing 14-year-old girl.

books.title: THE DUKE AND I
books.author: Julia Quinn
books.description: The first book in the Bridgerton series. Daphne Bridgerton’s reputation soars when she colludes with the Duke of Hastings. The basis of the Netflix series “Bridgerton.”

books.title: WE BEGIN AT THE END
books.author: Chris Whitaker
books.description: Trouble might start for the chief of police and a self-proclaimed outlaw teenager when a man is released from prison.

books.title: CAMINO WINDS
books.author: John Grisham
books.description: The line between fact and fiction becomes blurred when an author of thrillers is found dead after a hurricane hits Camino Island.

books.title: THE AFFAIR
books.author: Danielle Steel
books.description: A French author's extramarital relationship affects various members of his wife’s family.

books.title: TRANSIENT DESIRES
books.author: Donna Leon
books.description: The 30th book in the Commissario Guido Brunetti series. The Carabinieri and the Guardia di Costiera are enlisted to help solve a crime involving technologically gifted perpetrators.

books.title: THE VISCOUNT WHO LOVED ME
books.author: Julia Quinn
books.description: The second book in the Bridgerton series. Kate Sheffield gets in the way of Anthony Bridgerton's intent to marry.

books.title: THE PRESIDENT'S DAUGHTER
books.author: James Patterson and Bill Clinton
books.description: Matthew Keating, a past president and former Navy SEAL, goes on his own to find his abducted teenage daughter.

books.title: GOLDEN GIRL
books.author: Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: A Nantucket novelist gets one final summer to watch what happens from the great beyond.

books.title: TOM CLANCY: TARGET ACQUIRED
books.author: Don Bentley
books.description: A cushy assignment to help the C.I.A. puts Jack Ryan Jr. in the sights of trained killers.

books.title: THE LAST THING HE TOLD ME
books.author: Laura Dave
books.description: Hannah Hall discovers truths about her missing husband and bonds with his daughter from a previous relationship.

books.title: MALIBU RISING
books.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: An epic party has serious outcomes for four famous siblings.

books.title: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING
books.author: Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.

books.title: SOOLEY
books.author: John Grisham
books.description: Samuel Sooleymon receives a basketball scholarship to North Carolina Central and determines to bring his family over from a civil war-ravaged South Sudan.

books.title: FREED
books.author: E.L. James
books.description: The final chapter of the Fifty Shades as Told by Christian trilogy delves into the wedding between Christian Grey and Anastasia Steele.

books.title: PROJECT HAIL MARY
books.author: Andy Weir
books.description: Ryland Grace awakes from a long sleep alone and far from home, and the fate of humanity rests on his shoulders.

books.title: LEGACY
books.author: Nora Roberts
books.description: Threats put in rhymes and sent from shifting locations escalate as the daughter of a successful fitness celebrity’s own yoga business grows.

books.title: PEOPLE WE MEET ON VACATION
books.author: Emily Henry
books.description: Opposites Poppy and Alex meet to vacation together one more time in hopes of saving their relationship.

books.title: THE SILENT PATIENT
books.author: Alex Michaelides
books.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.

books.title: THE SONG OF ACHILLES
books.author: Madeline Miller
books.description: A reimagining of Homer’s “Iliad” that is narrated by Achilles' companion Patroclus.

books.title: FORGOTTEN IN DEATH
books.author: J.D. Robb
books.description: The 53rd book of the In Death series. The property where a decades-old crime occurred belongs to the homicide detective Eve Dallas’s husband.

books.title: BEAUTIFUL WORLD, WHERE ARE YOU
books.author: Sally Rooney
books.description: A novelist, a warehouse worker, an editorial assistant and a political adviser deal with changes.

books.title: IT ENDS WITH US
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse; the basis of the film.

books.title: BILLY SUMMERS
books.author: Stephen King
books.description: A killer for hire who only takes out bad guys seeks redemption as he does one final job.

books.title: A SLOW FIRE BURNING
books.author: Paula Hawkins
books.description: Three women come under scrutiny when a young man is found gruesomely murdered in a London houseboat.

books.title: THE LAST THING HE TOLD ME
books.author: Laura Dave
books.description: Hannah Hall discovers truths about her missing husband and bonds with his daughter from a previous relationship.

books.title: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO
books.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.

books.title: THE NIGHT SHE DISAPPEARED
books.author: Lisa Jewell
books.description: A writer discovers a possible clue near an English country estate of what caused a young couple to go missing.

books.title: THE MADNESS OF CROWDS
books.author: Louise Penny
books.description: The 17th book in the Chief Inspector Gamache series. Gamache is tasked with providing security for a statistics professor whose views are repulsive to him.

books.title: THE HERON'S CRY
books.author: Ann Cleeves
books.description: The second book in the Two Rivers series. Detective Matthew Venn finds a staged murder at the home of a group of artists.

books.title: MATRIX
books.author: Lauren Groff
books.description: Seventeen-year-old Marie de France is cast out of the royal court and sent to England to be the new prioress of an impoverished abbey.

books.title: ROCK PAPER SCISSORS
books.author: Alice Feeney
books.description: A couple celebrating an anniversary take a trip to Scotland that will make or break their marriage.

books.title: NINE PERFECT STRANGERS
books.author: Liane Moriarty
books.description: A romance writer becomes fascinated by the owner and director of a health resort.

books.title: CALL US WHAT WE CARRY
books.author: Amanda Gorman
books.description: A debut collection of poems on identity and history by the presidential inaugural poet who wrote “The Hill We Climb.”

books.title: THE JUDGE'S LIST
books.author: John Grisham
books.description: The second book in the Whistler series. Investigator Lacy Stoltz goes after a serial killer and closes in on a sitting judge.

books.title: GO TELL THE BEES THAT I AM GONE
books.author: Diana Gabaldon
books.description: The ninth book in the Outlander series. As the Revolutionary War moves closer to Fraser’s Ridge, Claire and Jamie reunite with their daughter and her family.

books.title: THE LINCOLN HIGHWAY
books.author: Amor Towles
books.description: Two friends who escaped from a juvenile work farm take Emmett Watson on an unexpected journey to New York City in 1954.

books.title: WISH YOU WERE HERE
books.author: Jodi Picoult
books.description: Diana O’Toole re-evaluates her seemingly perfect life when a pandemic disrupts her vacation in the Galápagos Islands.

books.title: THE STRANGER IN THE LIFEBOAT
books.author: Mitch Albom
books.description: After a ship explodes, 10 people struggling to survive pull a man who claims to be the Lord out of the sea.

books.title: THE WISH
books.author: Nicholas Sparks
books.description: Maggie Dawes, a renowned travel photographer, struggles with a medical diagnosis over Christmas.

books.title: FEAR NO EVIL
books.author: James Patterson
books.description: The 29th book in the Alex Cross series. Cross fights the mastermind who has stalked him for years.

books.title: CLOUD CUCKOO LAND
books.author: Anthony Doerr
books.description: An interconnected cast of dreamers and outsiders are in dangerous and disparate settings past, present and future.

books.title: THE DARK HOURS
books.author: Michael Connelly
books.description: A death on New Year’s Eve, an unsolved murder and a hunt for serial rapists bring Bosch and Ballard back together.

books.title: MERCY
books.author: David Baldacci
books.description: The fourth book in the Atlee Pine series. Atlee discovers her twin sister survived an abduction at the age of 6.

books.title: AUTOPSY
books.author: Patricia Cornwell
books.description: The 25th book in the Kay Scarpetta series. Scarpetta investigates crime scenes in Virginia and outer space.

books.title: RUN, ROSE, RUN

books.description: A singer-songwriter goes to Nashville seeking stardom but is followed by her dark past.

books.title: SHADOWS REEL

books.description: The 22nd book in the Joe Pickett series. A fishing guide’s murder, stolen falcons and a Nazi official’s photo album heighten the danger.

books.title: HIGH STAKES
books.author: Danielle Steel
books.description: A new assistant seeks to shake things up at a boutique literary and talent agency where damaging secrets have been kept hidden.

books.title: VERITY
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth.

books.title: THE PARIS APARTMENT
books.author: Lucy Foley
books.description: Jess has suspicions about her half-brother’s neighbors when he goes missing.

books.title: THE GOLDEN COUPLE
books.author: Greer Hendricks and Sarah Pekkanen
books.description: An infidelity forces Marissa and Matthew to seek help from an unlicensed therapist who uses unorthodox methods.

books.title: THE LIGHTNING ROD
books.author: Brad Meltzer
books.description: The second book in the Escape Artist series. Zig stumbles upon a hidden group that threatens America's safety and security.

books.title: ONE ITALIAN SUMMER
books.author: Rebecca Serle
books.description: During a summer trip in Italy, Katy’s late mother reappears as a 30-year-old woman.

books.title: THE LOVE HYPOTHESIS
books.author: Ali Hazelwood
books.description: A young professor agrees to pretend to be a third-year Ph.D. candidate’s boyfriend.

books.title: THE LINCOLN HIGHWAY
books.author: Amor Towles
books.description: Two friends who escaped from a juvenile work farm take Emmett Watson on an unexpected journey to New York City in 1954.

books.title: THE MAID
books.author: Nita Prose
books.description: When a wealthy man is found dead in his room, a maid at the Regency Grand Hotel becomes a lead suspect.

books.title: SPARRING PARTNERS
books.author: John Grisham
books.description: Three novellas: “Homecoming,” “Strawberry Moon” and “Sparring Partners.”

books.title: BOOK LOVERS
books.author: Emily Henry
books.description: While on vacation in North Carolina, a literary agent keeps running into an editor.

books.title: UGLY LOVE
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.description: A casual sexual relationship between Tate and Miles becomes more complicated than they expected.

books.title: TOM CLANCY: ZERO HOUR
books.author: Don Bentley
books.description: Jack Ryan Jr. appears to be the only person who can stop a second Korean war.

books.title: THE OMEGA FACTOR
books.author: Steve Berry
books.description: The UNESCO investigator Nick Lee winds up on the trail of a panel from the Ghent Altarpiece, which was stolen in 1934.

books.title: NOVEMBER 9
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.description: Ben and Fallon meet on the same day each year but a possible untruth might spoil their relationship.

books.title: NIGHTWORK
books.author: Nora Roberts
books.description: Harry Booth, a master thief, breaks things off with Miranda when a dangerous contact might harm her.

books.title: MEANT TO BE
books.author: Emily Giffin
books.description: Joe, the disappointing scion of a family considered American royalty, and Cate, a budding model seeking to escape her surroundings, find each other.

books.title: BEACH READ
books.author: Emily Henry
books.description: A relationship develops between a literary fiction author and a romance novelist as they both try to overcome writer’s block.

books.title: WICKED BEAUTY
books.author: Katee Robert
books.description: The third book in the Dark Olympus series. Achilles and Patroclus compete for power and Helen’s affection.

books.title: FAIRY TALE
books.author: Stephen King
books.description: A high school kid inherits a shed that is a portal to another world where good and evil are at war.

books.title: DESPERATION IN DEATH
books.author: J.D. Robb
books.description: The 55th book of the In Death series. Eve Dallas is reminded of her past as she investigates a possible sex trafficking ring.

books.title: A COURT OF SILVER FLAMES
books.author: Sarah J. Maas
books.description: The fifth book in the Court of Thorns and Roses series. Nesta Archeron is forced into close quarters with a warrior named Cassian.

books.title: THE AMERICAN ROOMMATE EXPERIMENT
books.author: Elena Armas
books.description: A romance writer goes on experimental dates with her best friend’s cousin to restart her writing.

books.title: CLIVE CUSSLER'S HELLBURNER
books.author: Mike Maden
books.description: The 16th book in the Oregon Files series. A criminal syndicate has a torpedo that could obliterate entire cities.

books.title: HELL AND BACK
books.author: Craig Johnson
books.description: The 18th book in the Longmire series. Sheriff Longmire finds an adversary in himself.

books.title: FIRE AND BLOOD
books.author: George R.R. Martin
books.description: Set 300 years before the events of “A Game of Thrones,” this is the first volume of the two-part history of the Targaryens in Westeros.

books.title: LOVE ON THE BRAIN
books.author: Ali Hazelwood
books.description: Heartbeats quicken and neurons fire when a pair of antagonistic scientists work together on a project.

books.title: CARRIE SOTO IS BACK
books.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A tennis player comes out of retirement and trains with her father to defend her record.

books.title: IT STARTS WITH US
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.description: In the sequel to “It Ends With Us,” Lily deals with her jealous ex-husband as she reconnects with her first boyfriend.

books.title: LESSONS IN CHEMISTRY
books.author: Bonnie Garmus
books.description: A scientist and single mother living in California in the 1960s becomes a star on a TV cooking show.

books.title: THE BOYS FROM BILOXI
books.author: John Grisham
books.description: Two childhood friends follow in their fathers’ footsteps, which puts them on opposite sides of the law.

books.title: DEMON COPPERHEAD
books.author: Barbara Kingsolver
books.description: Winner of a 2023 Pulitzer Prize for fiction. A reimagining of Charles Dickens’s “David Copperfield” set in the mountains of southern Appalachia.

books.title: DREAMLAND
books.author: Nicholas Sparks
books.description: Musicians from different backgrounds are attracted to each other and a mother flees with her son from an abusive husband.

books.title: A WORLD OF CURIOSITIES
books.author: Louise Penny
books.description: The 18th book in the Chief Inspector Gamache series. When an attic room that was sealed off 160 years ago is opened, an old enemy returns.

books.title: TOMORROW, AND TOMORROW, AND TOMORROW
books.author: Gabrielle Zevin
books.description: Two friends find their partnership challenged in the world of video game design.

books.title: MAD HONEY
books.author: Jodi Picoult and Jennifer Finney Boylan
books.description: After returning to her hometown, Olivia McAfee’s son gets accused of killing his crush.

books.title: DAISY JONES & THE SIX
books.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A fictional oral history charting the rise and fall of a ’70s rock ’n’ roll band.

books.title: NEVER NEVER
books.author: Colleen Hoover and Tarryn Fisher
books.description: Questions arise when a pair of lovers try to uncover why they suddenly became strangers.

books.title: WORTHY OPPONENTS
books.author: Danielle Steel
books.description: A divorced mother of twins and chief executive of a luxury department store goes against a wealthy investor looking to take it over.

books.title: HEART BONES
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.description: After an unexpected death prevents her from going to Penn State and and forces her to move in with her absent father, Beyah Grim has a summer fling with the rich guy next door.

books.title: STORM WATCH
books.author: C.J. Box
books.description: The 23rd book in the Joe Pickett series. Joe and Nate might be on opposite sides for the first time.

books.title: PINEAPPLE STREET
books.author: Jenny Jackson
books.description: Three women navigate their roles in a well-to-do family living in Brooklyn Heights.

books.title: THINGS WE HIDE FROM THE LIGHT
books.author: Lucy Score
books.description: The second book in the Knockemout series. A woman with some secrets and the chief of police have different ideas about where things are headed.

books.title: THE PARIS APARTMENT
books.author: Lucy Foley
books.description: Jess has suspicions about her half-brother’s eclectic and unfriendly neighbors when he goes missing.

books.title: CROSS DOWN
books.author: James Patterson and Brendan DuBois
books.description: John Sampson seeks justice after Alex Cross gets injured.

books.title: HAPPY PLACE
books.author: Emily Henry
books.description: A former couple pretend to be together for the sake of their friends during their annual getaway in Maine.

books.title: FOURTH WING
books.author: Rebecca Yarros
books.description: Violet Sorrengail is urged by the commanding general, who also is her mother, to become a candidate for the elite dragon riders.

books.title: THE COVENANT OF WATER
books.author: Abraham Verghese
books.description: Three generations of a family living on South India’s Malabar Coast suffer the loss of a family member by drowning.

books.title: UNFORTUNATELY YOURS
books.author: Tessa Bailey
books.description: The second book in the Vine Mess series. An heiress, who lost her job and fiancé, schemes to marry a vineyard owner, who is clueless about making wine, to gain access to her trust fund.

books.title: NEAR MISS
books.author: Stuart Woods and Brett Battles
books.description: The 64th book in the Stone Barrington series. Stone encounters some familiar enemies.

books.title: CLIVE CUSSLER: FIRE STRIKE
books.author: Mike Maden
books.description: The 17th book in the Oregon Files series. Juan Cabrillo’s crew takes on a force of bio-hacked soldiers.

books.title: ICEBREAKER
books.author: Hannah Grace
books.description: Anastasia might need the help of the captain of a college hockey team to get on the Olympic figure skating team.

books.title: IDENTITY
books.author: Nora Roberts
books.description: After her roommate is killed by a con artist, a former Army brat builds a new life at her mother's home in Vermont.

books.title: LADY TAN'S CIRCLE OF WOMEN
books.author: Lisa See
books.description: Tan Yunxian learns the pillars of Chinese medicine from her grandmother but is sent into an arranged marriage and pressured by her mother-in-law.

books.title: VINCE FLYNN: CODE RED
books.author: Kyle Mills
books.description: The 22nd book in the Mitch Rapp series. Rapp and his team try to foil a plot by Russia without being discovered.

books.title: HOLLY
books.author: Stephen King
books.description: The private detective Holly Gibney investigates whether a married pair of octogenarian academics had anything to do with Bonnie Dahl’s disappearance.

books.title: FOURTH WING
books.author: Rebecca Yarros
books.description: Violet Sorrengail is urged by the commanding general, who also is her mother, to become a candidate for the elite dragon riders.

books.title: 23 1/2 LIES
books.author: James Patterson
books.description: Three thrillers: “23 ½ Lies” (written with Maxine Paetro), “Fallen Ranger” (written with Andrew Bourelle) and “Watch Your Back” (written with Loren D. Estleman).

books.title: THINGS WE LEFT BEHIND
books.author: Lucy Score
books.description: The third book in the Knockemout series. A mogul and a small-town librarian share a dark secret from their past.

books.title: FALL OF RUIN AND WRATH
books.author: Jennifer L. Armentrout
books.description: In a world where only nine cities were spared divine destruction, Calista must decide whether to follow her intuition to safety or court calamity by pursuing a love.

books.title: TOM LAKE
books.author: Ann Patchett
books.description: Three daughters, who return to their family orchard in the spring of 2020, learn about their mother’s relationship with a famous actor.

books.title: THE HOUSEMAID
books.author: Freida McFadden
books.description: Troubles surface when a woman looking to make a fresh start takes a job in the home of the Winchesters.

books.title: TOO LATE
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.description: Dangers develop when a drug trafficker becomes obsessed with a woman who has a mutual attraction to a D.E.A. agent.

books.title: THE COVENANT OF WATER
books.author: Abraham Verghese
books.description: Three generations of a family living on South India’s Malabar Coast suffer the loss of a family member by drowning.

books.title: PAYBACK IN DEATH
books.author: J.D. Robb
books.description: The 57th book of the In Death series. Eve Dallas looks into the death of an internal affairs captain.

books.title: ASSISTANT TO THE VILLAIN
books.author: Hannah Nicole Maehrer
books.description: Evie Sage gets a job doing unspecified office duties for the most infamous villain in the kingdom of Rennedawn.

books.title: THE VASTER WILDS
books.author: Lauren Groff
books.description: A servant girl, who escapes with almost nothing from a colonial settlement, finds the beliefs she learned are tested.

books.title: IRON FLAME
books.author: Rebecca Yarros
books.description: The second book in the Empyrean series. Violet Sorrengail’s next round of training under the new vice commandant might require her to betray the man she loves.

books.title: THE HEAVEN & EARTH GROCERY STORE
books.author: James McBride
books.description: Secrets held by the residents of a dilapidated neighborhood come to life when a skeleton is found at the bottom of a well.

books.title: THE EXCHANGE
books.author: John Grisham
books.description: In a sequel to “The Firm,” Mitch McDeere, who is now a partner at the world’s largest law firm, gets caught up in a sinister plot.

books.title: THE LITTLE LIAR
books.author: Mitch Albom
books.description: The actions of an 11-year-old boy help facilitate the delivery of Jewish residents, including his family, to Auschwitz.

books.title: THE EDGE
books.author: David Baldacci
books.description: The second book in the 6:20 Man series. Travis Devine investigates the murder of the C.I.A. operative Jenny Silkwell in rural Maine.

books.title: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE
books.author: Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.

books.title: ALEX CROSS MUST DIE
books.author: James Patterson
books.description: The 32nd book in the Alex Cross series. When a jet is gunned down, Cross goes back into action.

books.title: THE WOMEN
books.author: Kristin Hannah
books.description: A nurse follows her brother to serve during the Vietnam War and returns to a divided America.

books.title: A TOUCH OF CHAOS
books.author: Scarlett St
books.description: The seventh book in the Hades X Persephone series. The Goddess of Spring must come to terms with her new identity as the Queen of the Underworld.

books.title: HAPPY PLACE
books.author: Emily Henry
books.description: A former couple pretend to be together for the sake of their friends during their annual getaway in Maine.

books.title: THE INMATE
books.author: Freida McFadden
books.description: A nurse practitioner at a maximum-security prison gave testimony against her former boyfriend that put him behind bars.

books.title: STILL SEE YOU EVERYWHERE
books.author: Lisa Gardner
books.description: The third book in the Frankie Elkin series. Frankie must find the sister, who was kidnapped over a decade ago, of a serial killer on death row.

books.title: THE TEACHER
books.author: Freida McFadden
books.description: A math teacher at Caseham High suspects there is more going on behind a scandal involving a teacher and a student.

books.title: THE HUNTER
books.author: Tana French
books.description: The life that a Chicago P.D. retiree has built in Ireland with a local woman and her daughter comes under threat.

books.title: BRIDE
books.author: Ali Hazelwood
books.description: Issues of trust arise when an alliance is made between a Vampyre named Misery Lark and a Were named Lowe Moreland.

books.title: FIRST LIE WINS
books.author: Ashley Elston
books.description: A woman who works for a mysterious boss takes on a new identity to dig up information on someone.

books.title: THE HOUSEMAID IS WATCHING
books.author: Freida McFadden
books.description: The third book in the Housemaid series. Dangers lurk in a quiet neighborhood.

books.title: SWAN SONG
books.author: Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: Nantucket residents are alarmed when a home, recently sold at an exorbitant price, goes up in flames and someone goes missing.

books.title: NOT IN LOVE
books.author: Ali Hazelwood
books.description: A biotech engineer at a food science start-up has a secret affair with one of the business partners who took over the company.

books.title: ERUPTION
books.author: Michael Crichton and James Patterson
books.description: The Big Island of Hawaii comes under threat by a volcano at the same time a secret held by the military comes to light.

books.title: CAMINO GHOSTS
books.author: John Grisham
books.description: The third book in the Camino series. The last living inhabitant of a deserted island gets in the way of a resort developer.

books.title: A COURT OF THORNS AND ROSES
books.author: Sarah J. Maas
books.description: After killing a wolf in the woods, Feyre is taken from her home and placed inside the world of the Fae.

books.title: YOU LIKE IT DARKER
books.author: Stephen King
books.description: A dozen short stories that explore darkness in literal and metaphorical forms.

books.title: FUNNY STORY
books.author: Emily Henry
books.description: After their exes run off together, Daphne and Miles form a friendship and concoct a plan involving misleading photos.

books.title: A COURT OF MIST AND FURY
books.author: Sarah J. Maas
books.description: The second book in the Court of Thorns and Roses series. Feyre gains the powers of the High Fae and a greater evil emerges.

books.title: THIS SUMMER WILL BE DIFFERENT
books.author: Carley Fortune
books.description: Lucy returns to Prince Edward Island, where she finds it difficult to stay away from her best friend’s younger brother.

books.title: JUST FOR THE SUMMER
books.author: Abby Jimenez
books.description: Justin and Emma, whose exes find soulmates after breaking up with them, have a fling on a private island on Lake Minnetonka.

books.title: LEATHER AND LARK
books.author: Brynne Weaver
books.description: The second book in the Ruinous Love series. An indie musician offers a contract killer a way to his freedom, but only if he'll marry her.

books.title: SOMEWHERE BEYOND THE SEA
books.author: TJ Klune
books.description: The second book in the Cerulean Chronicles series. The headmaster of a strange orphanage seeks to protect the magical children who reside there.

books.title: HERE ONE MOMENT
books.author: Liane Moriarty
books.description: Passengers on a short and seemingly unremarkable flight learn how and when they are going to die.

books.title: TELL ME EVERYTHING
books.author: Elizabeth Strout
books.description: As a murder casts a pall on a town in Maine, Lucy Barton, Olive Kitteridge and Bob Burgess share stories and seek meaning.

books.title: THE PERFECT COUPLE
books.author: Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: A body is found in Nantucket Harbor hours before a picture-perfect wedding.

books.title: DEMON COPPERHEAD
books.author: Barbara Kingsolver
books.description: Winner of a 2023 Pulitzer Prize for fiction. A reimagining of Charles Dickens’s “David Copperfield” set in the mountains of southern Appalachia.

books.title: IRON FLAME
books.author: Rebecca Yarros
books.description: The second book in the Empyrean series. Violet Sorrengail’s next round of training might require her to betray the man she loves.

books.title: VINCE FLYNN: CAPTURE OR KILL
books.author: Don Bentley
books.description: The 23rd book in the Mitch Rapp series. In 2011, operations take place to prevent a looming war in the Middle East.

books.title: THE GAMES GODS PLAY
books.author: Abigail Owen
books.description: Gods enlist mortals to fight in their stead to determine who will sit on the throne in Olympus.

books.title: THE LIFE IMPOSSIBLE
books.author: Matt Haig
books.description: A retired math teacher who inherits a run-down house on a Mediterranean island from a friend goes in search of answers.

books.title: JAMES
books.author: Percival Everett
books.description: A reimagining of “Adventures of Huckleberry Finn” shines a different light on Mark Twain's classic, revealing new facets of the character of Jim.

books.title: WIND AND TRUTH
books.author: Brandon Sanderson
books.description: The fifth book in the Stormlight Archive series. The fate of the Cosmere is imperiled as the fighting and chaos reach an apex.

books.title: WICKED
books.author: Gregory Maguire
books.description: A misunderstood girl named Elphaba is declared a witch; the basis of the musical and the film.

books.title: FOURTH WING
books.author: Rebecca Yarros
books.description: Violet Sorrengail is urged by the commanding general, who also is her mother, to become a candidate for the elite dragon riders.

books.title: THE HOUSE OF CROSS
books.author: James Patterson
books.description: The 33rd book in the Alex Cross series. Three candidates to the Supreme Court are violently attacked.

books.title: THE GOD OF THE WOODS
books.author: Liz Moore
books.description: When a 13-year-old girl disappears from an Adirondack summer camp in 1975, secrets kept by the Van Laar family emerge.

books.title: THE WEDDING PEOPLE
books.author: Alison Espach
books.description: A woman who is down on her luck forms an unexpected bond with the bride at a wedding in Rhode Island.

books.title: THE FROZEN RIVER
books.author: Ariel Lawhon
books.description: In Maine, 1789, a midwife seeks to uncover the true cause of the death of a man discovered entombed in the Kennebec River.

books.title: QUICKSILVER
books.author: Callie Hart
books.description: Saeris is transported to a dangerous land of ice and snow, where she must contend with a Fae warrior who has suspect agendas.

books.title: SMALL THINGS LIKE THESE
books.author: Claire Keegan
books.description: A coal merchant discovers something that causes turmoil in a small Irish town controlled by the church in 1985; the basis of the film.

books.title: TO DIE FOR
books.author: David Baldacci
books.description: The third book in the 6:20 Man series. Devine digs into the deaths of an orphan’s parents and uncovers a large conspiracy.

books.title: COUNTING MIRACLES
books.author: Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A man in search of the father he never knew encounters a single mom and rumors circulate of the nearby appearance of a white deer.

books.title: ONYX STORM
books.author: Rebecca Yarros
books.description: The third book in the Empyrean series. As enemies gain traction, Violet Sorrengail goes beyond the Aretian wards in search of allies.

books.title: STORY OF MY LIFE
books.author: Lucy Score
books.description: A romance writer suffering from writer’s block moves away from Manhattan and finds inspiration in Story Lake, Pa.

books.title: BROKEN COUNTRY
books.author: Clare Leslie Hall
books.description: Beth must confront her past when the man she once loved as a teenager returns to the village with his son.

books.title: WARD D
books.author: Freida McFadden
books.description: Patients and staff at a hospital’s mental health unit begin to disappear.

books.title: THE NIGHTINGALE
books.author: Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters in World War II France: one struggling to survive in the countryside, the other joining the Resistance.

books.title: THE CRASH
books.author: Freida McFadden
books.description: A pregnant woman, who suffers an injury during a blizzard, is taken in by a couple who might put her life in further jeopardy.

books.title: DEEP END
books.author: Ali Hazelwood
books.description: As the pressure leading up to the Olympics builds so do the feelings Lukas and Scarlett have for each other.

books.title: LIGHTS OUT
books.author: Navessa Allen
books.description: As Aly and Josh live out their dark fantasies, someone with sinister intentions impinges on them.

books.title: WILD SIDE
books.author: Elsie Silver
books.description: The third book in the Rose Hill series. Tension rises between Tabitha and Rhys.

books.title: CAUGHT UP
books.author: Navessa Allen
books.description: The second book of the Into Darkness series. Nico “Junior” Trocci and Lauren Marchetti become ensnared in a game of seduction.

books.title: BURY OUR BONES IN THE MIDNIGHT SOIL
books.author: V.E. Schwab
books.description: Stories set in Santo Domingo de la Calzada in 1532, London in 1827 and Boston in 2019 explore hunger, love and rage.

books.title: ATMOSPHERE
books.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: In the summer of 1980, Joan Goodwin begins training with a group of candidates for NASA’s space shuttle program.

books.title: THE FIRST GENTLEMAN
books.author: Bill Clinton and James Patterson
books.description: When President Wright’s husband goes on trial for murder, a pair of journalists search for answers.

books.title: ONE GOLDEN SUMMER
books.author: Carley Fortune
books.description: A photographer returns to a place where she spent a summer as a teenager and runs into the guy she had a crush on back then.

books.title: NEVER FLINCH
books.author: Stephen King
books.description: Holly Gibney does double duty by helping head off acts of retribution and protecting a women’s rights activist.

books.title: HOUSE OF FLAME AND SHADOW
books.author: Sarah J. Maas
books.description: The third book in the Crescent City series. Bryce wants to return home while Hunt is trapped in Asteri's dungeons.

books.title: THE RIVER IS WAITING
books.author: Wally Lamb
books.description: A man struggling in several areas of his life is sentenced to prison, where he encounters acts of kindness and brutality.

books.title: THE TENANT
books.author: Freida McFadden
books.description: Things take an unsettling turn when a marketing executive loses his job and a woman rents a room in his brownstone.

books.title: WITH A VENGEANCE
books.author: Riley Sager
books.description: The murder of a passenger on a luxury train disrupts Anna Matheson’s plan to get retribution for her family’s downfall.

books.title: PROBLEMATIC SUMMER ROMANCE
books.author: Ali Hazelwood
books.description: Things get complicated between an older biotech guy and a struggling graduate student who go to a destination wedding.

books.title: GREAT BIG BEAUTIFUL LIFE
books.author: Emily Henry
books.description: A writer looking for her big break competes against a Pulitzer winner to tell the story of an octogenarian with a storied past.

books.title: NIGHTSHADE
books.author: Michael Connelly
books.description: The Los Angeles County sheriff's detective Stilwell gets reassigned to Catalina Island, where he investigates a poaching case and a Jane Doe found in the harbor.

books.title: KING OF ASHES
books.author: S.A. Cosby
books.description: Roman Carruthers uses his finance skills to deal with criminals and try to hold his family together.

books.title: THE SECRET OF SECRETS
books.author: Dan Brown
books.description: As he searches for the missing noetic scientist he has been seeing, Robert Langdon discovers something regarding a secret project.

books.title: WILD CARD
books.author: Elsie Silver
books.description: The fourth book in the Rose Hill series. Gwen gets close to her ex-boyfriend’s dad, who is trying to repair his relationship with his son.

books.title: CLOWN TOWN
books.author: Mick Herron
books.description: The ninth book in the Slough House series. Lessons from old spies may come to bear as the ugly side of state security is threatened with exposure.

books.title: THE SURROGATE MOTHER
books.author: Freida McFadden
books.description: Abby’s personal assistant, who offers to be her surrogate, also carries an unspeakable secret.

books.title: KATABASIS
books.author: R.F. Kuang
books.description: A pair of rival graduate students descend into the underworld to save their late professor and secure his recommendation.

books.title: LOVER FORBIDDEN
books.author: J.R. Ward
books.description: The 23rd book in the Black Dagger Brotherhood series. Devlin’s secret may sour Lyric’s new zest for life.

books.title: FRAMED IN DEATH
books.author: J.D. Robb
books.description: The 61st book of the In Death series. Eve Dallas investigates the murder of a woman found in the doorway of two gallery owners' home.

books.title: PITCHER PERFECT
books.author: Tessa Bailey
books.description: The fourth book in the Big Shots series. A hockey player poses as the boyfriend of a softball pitcher.

books.title: CLIVE CUSSLER: THE IRON STORM
books.author: Jack Du Brul
books.description: The 15th book in the Isaac Bell series. During the Great War, evil forces want to take the fight to the streets of the United States.

books.title: BUCKEYE
books.author: Patrick Ryan
books.description: Consequences created by a secret forged between members of two families in a small Ohio town affect a new generation.

books.title: THE HALLMARKED MAN
books.author: Robert Galbraith
books.description: The eighth book in the Cormoran Strike series. A dismembered corpse found in a silver shop sets off an investigation.

books.title: PROJECT HAIL MARY
books.author: Andy Weir
books.description: Ryland Grace awakes from a long sleep alone and far from home, and the fate of humanity rests on his shoulders.

books.title: MY FRIENDS
books.author: Fredrik Backman
books.description: A young woman looks into the story behind a painting that was made 25 years ago and a small group of teens depicted in it; translated by Neil Smith.

books.title: PEOPLE WATCHING
books.author: Hannah Bonam-Young
books.description: A relationship between Prudence and Milo in a small Ontario town may shift to something beyond their expectations.
